Title: Downloads
Description: Flashpoint is free, portable, and $1{powered by open-source software}. We work hard to keep Flashpoint safe despite the unsupported nature of many of the web technologies we preserve. If you have any questions or concerns, consult the $2{FAQ} or ask in the $3{Discord}.
Windows_Avast_Warning: $1{Avast and AVG Users:} Read $2{this article} after installing, otherwise Flashpoint will not work correctly!
Windows_Infinity_Para1: Games are downloaded on-demand from our servers. Internet connection is required to download game files.
Windows_Infinity_Para2: Use the included Flashpoint Manager utility to fine-tune and update your installation.
Windows_Ultimate_Para1: The entire archive in one enormous package. Internet connection is not required.
Windows_Ultimate_Para2: Read $1{this article} for information about downloading, extracting, and updating Ultimate.
MacOS_Infinity_Para1: See the $1{Mac Support} page for more information as well as known issues.
MacOS_Infinity_Para2: Note that games in Flashpoint will generally be less performant on macOS Catalina and higher compared to older versions of macOS due to the removal of native 32-bit support, and the extra processing that is required to make them work as a result.
Linux_Infinity_Para1: See the $1{Linux Support} page for more information as well as known issues.
Linux_Infinity_Para2: All dependencies are included within the download, so it should work fine out-of-the-box in immutable environments such as SteamOS. If you are in a mutable environment and would like to use distro-provided dependencies instead, follow $1{these instructions}.
Linux_System_Requirements: Most recent 64-bit Linux distributions should work
Old_Releases_Para1: Below you can find links to old Flashpoint downloads. They are provided $1{as-is}; do not expect to receive technical assistance regarding outdated Flashpoint versions.
Old_Releases_Para2: $1{Note:} Although old versions of Ultimate (which comprises the full archive) are well-preserved as of version 1.4, a large number of other downloads - especially those for macOS and Linux - have unfortunately gone missing over the years due to a variety of factors. You will find them listed below, where they are colored $2{red} and cannot be clicked. If you are in possession of any of these missing downloads, let us know either $3{by email} or through the #project-historians channel in our $4{Discord server}.
Old_Ultimate_Infinity_Notice: Most old versions of Infinity are no longer capable of downloading games, and are provided only for posterity.
Old_Flashpoint_5_Note: Note: must be logged into Internet Archive account to download
Old_Core_Notice1: Flashpoint Core was the curation environment for Flashpoint prior to version 12. It contains one example game for each platform.
Old_Core_Notice2: Curations made using any version of Core will not be accepted.
Old_Flashpoint_Zero_Note: Note: no relation to the other Flashpoint Zero
